review: We've had the Amazon Fire TV Stick for about 2 months now. So easy to get set up. It took maybe 10 minutes tops. It walks you through the process. We use it for SlingTV, Netflix and games apps. We have only had one issue and that was that recently it was not picking up the wifi signal.  All our other devices were working properly so we unplugged the Fire Stick for 30 seconds, pugged it back in and problem solved. We love it!

review: I picked up the fire stick because it was $39. Figured we really couldn't lose. Or return it if it didn't work. We have a complicated home network set up – and use Apple TV with our family room smart TV.  Picked up the fire stick for an HDTV in a bedroom that doesn't have Apple TV.  I was able to set this up in no time, including downloading and activating apps HBOGO, etc.,  not to mention accessing all the stuff from our Amazon prime account. Sweet.  So often promises of "easy installation" are patently false. Not so with the Fire Stick,  which is why I took the time to write this review.
